properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 9:12PM EST until February 8 at 5:23AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County

Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Barrow and Jackson
Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Alcovy River near High Point affecting Newton County

Big Haynes Creek near Milstead  affecting Newton and Rockdale
Counties

Yellow River near Rocky Plains affecting Newton County

Echeconnee Creek near Byron affecting Bibb...Crawford...Houston
and Peach Counties

Little River near Washington affecting Taliaferro and Wilkes
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Little River near Eatonton.
* Until late tonight.
* At 8 PM Friday the stage was 22.7 feet...and falling.
* Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue.
* Flood stage is 20 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage tonight.
* At 22 feet...Minor flooding continues to expand into the
woodlands and fields along the river of the Oconee National Forest
upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or
Monticello Road.
